00019 class TagModel extends Galleria_Model_Collection
00020 {
00021 
00030     public function getTagName($tagid)
00031     {
00032         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00033         $sth = $pdo->prepare("SELECT t.name AS name FROM galleria.tags AS t WHERE t.id = ?");
00034         $sth->execute(array($tagid));
00035         return $sth->fetchObject()->name;
00036     }
00037 
00046     public function getPics($tagid)
00047     {
00048         $pdo = $this->_getConnection();
00049         if (Galleria_Auth::isLogged() && Galleria_Auth::getObject()->hasGroups()) {
00050             if (Galleria_Auth::getObject()->isInAdminGroup()) {
00051                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT p.id AS pid, p.description AS desc, p.shown FROM galleria.pictures AS p JOIN galleria.picturetags AS pt ON pt.pictureid = p.id AND pt.tagid = ?');
00052                 $sth->execute(array($tagid));
00053             } else {
00054                 $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.desc FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd JOIN galleria.picturetags AS pt ON pt.pictureid = pd.pid AND pt.tagid = ? WHERE (pd.gid IS NULL OR pd.gid IN (' . $this->_prepareIn(Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()) . ')) AND pd.shown = TRUE');
00055                 $sth->execute(array_merge(array($tagid), Galleria_Auth::getObject()->getSQLGroups()));
00056             }
00057         } else {
00058             $sth = $pdo->prepare('SELECT DISTINCT pd.pid, pd.desc FROM galleria.picturedata AS pd JOIN galleria.picturetags AS pt ON pt.pictureid = pd.pid AND pt.tagid = ? WHERE pd.gid IS NULL AND pd.shown = TRUE');
00059             $sth->execute(array($tagid));
00060         }
00061         return $this->_fetchObjects($sth);
00062     }
